unparsed_output: According to the document, six categories of individuals were requested to cover their own travel expenses to panel meetings: Officers and administrative staff of private firms and organizations, University Administrative staff - such as Presidents, Vice-Presidents, deans, etc., University department heads and other professionals who have grants or contracts from Federal agencies and private foundations where a certain portion of these funds could be justifiably used for the purpose of attending panel meetings, Officers and members of trade associations and other business associations and organizations, Individual private citizens, professional people and others who have the means to finance their own transportation, and Hospital Administrators.
